statements: SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions;
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount), MIN(transaction_amount) FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM fraud_detection_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE user_id = 1001 OR user_id = 1003 AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM fraud_detection_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM fraud_detection_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount, transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount) FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 3;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT detection_id, detection_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.detection_score FROM transactions t INNER JOIN fraud_detection f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.detection_score > 0.8
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t WHERE t.transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.amount DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY average_amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, f.detection_score, f.detection_time FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN fraud_detection f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.detection_score IS NULL
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score, detection_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score >= 80;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001
SELECT user_name, email, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_name, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY user_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT t.user_id, u.user_name, t.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM fraud_patterns;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE is_fraud = true ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT t.transaction_id, f.pattern_name, f.pattern_description FROM transactions t JOIN fraud_patterns f ON t.amount > 1000 AND f.pattern_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT u.name, t.amount FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.amount > 200 AND t.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM flagged_transactions WHERE is_resolved = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users WHERE is_blocked = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date, is_fraud FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE is_blocked = true
SELECT flag_id, transaction_id, flag_reason FROM flagged_transactions WHERE is_resolved = false
SELECT user_id, email, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date ASC
SELECT stat_date, total_transactions, total_flagged_transactions, fraud_percentage FROM fraud_detection_stats
